subject: Fashion
title: The Zoot Suit Rebellion
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Zoot Suit Rebellion.

hook.text: In 1943 young Mexican-Americans were beaten in LA for wearing oversized suits.

buildup.text: Zoot suits used excess fabric during wartime rationing‚Äîa deliberate provocation.

discovery.text: The style was a statement: dignity and visibility in a society that excluded you.

twist.text: Sailors attacked zoot suiters for days. Police arrested the victims, not attackers.

climax.text: The zoot suit became one of America's first fashion-as-protest movements.

punchline.text: When wearing a suit is an act of defiance, fashion is political.

quiz.question: Why was the zoot suit considered provocative during WWII?
options: It used excess fabric during wartime rationing
